text.value: Must be two digit between 9 and 100
Is there a source of drinking water in the school?
If not, where is the source of drinking water?
How long does it take to get water back and forth?
Are there latrines in the school?
If so, ask to visit the latrines
Observer: What type of latrine is this?
Observer: Does the pit opening have feces around it?
For example, is the pit covered?
Observer: What hand washing facilities are available?
What facilities can you see at least 3 metres from the latrines at the time of observation?
Less than 15 minutes round trip from school

Defecating or urinating in the bush/outdoors
